# basic
agec encrypt secret.txt -u aca
stdout 'encrypted "secret.txt.age"\n'
stdout 'rm "secret.txt"\n'
agec decrypt secret.txt.age -i key
stdout 'decrypted "secret.txt"\n'
exec cat secret.txt
stdout 'this is secret file'
agec ls
stdout 'secret.txt\n'

agec chown -u john secret.txt
agec encrypt secret.txt --force
! agec decrypt secret.txt.age -i key
stderr 'failed to decrypt "secret.txt.age": no identity matched any of the recipients\n'

agec decrypt secret.txt.age -i john.key
stdout 'decrypted "secret.txt"\n'

agec groups john
stdout 'john\n'

agec usermod john -g devops
agec groups john
stdout 'devops\n'

agec usermod john -g devops,john -a
agec groups john
stdout 'devops\njohn'
agec chown -g devops secret.txt
agec encrypt secret.txt
agec decrypt secret.txt.age -i key

agec ls
stdout 'secret.txt\n'
